post.body: ha! That's awesome.
no luck there either. Thanks.
thanks. No luck with that either.
no visible hole unless there's a mechanism inside the slot. All signs point to NO mechanical release.
great review, Dan. I am admittedly an Apple Whore and wouldn't consider the Storm, but it's good to hear a real world review. Thanks.
home button and power button at the same time. Screenshot of anything.
and that's good? Congratulations.
a brilliant idea indeed! Unless you pay for gas in Kalifornia...
I resolve to place women on a pedestal... Just high enough so I can see up their skirts. Thank you Steve Martin...
what the hell happened?! Hope you're on your way to recovering! :)
YES!
"jumbo" sidecars! http://snipurl.com/81upf
BTW, Dan Wilson, and the subsequent Nye's was prefaced by a fantastic dinner at 7Sushi. http://snipurl.com/81uci
Now at Nye's after escaping downtown following a great show by Dan Wilson. Thanks S!
Dan Wilson. Pantages. 1st set done. With Ssssanie. :-) http://snipurl.com/81elo
And here. We. Go... http://snipurl.com/80sof
Hennepin Theater district. Restaurant suggestions???
Like they say, nobody ever called the fire department because they did something smart. Hiawatha and 26th. http://snipurl.com/7xe6n
Michael is in need of more wine to make it through. Hi. My name is Michael, and I may be an alcoholic, at least when women are involved.
Although I don't write tweets in the FB style, tonight I would say "Michael is punishing himself with blog posts". What the hell am I doing.
The Dark Knight, gum, soup, crackers, Chex Mix, orange juice, and a Starbucks. This is what I take away from Target. Thank you.
Eggnog with booze in it sounds really really good right now...
Is it just me, or does riding a scooter today seem like a REALLY BAD IDEA?!
Going out to get my shovel on. Who's with me?!
Thanks to the incompetence of others, 2 hours has been added to my work day. Just in time for the winter advisory to roll in and the drive.
CD stuck in 2.8 Ghz Intel iMac. Nothing seems to work. Is there a manual button in that slot somewhere? Help!
Wishing you the worst, but hoping for the best. I've had wine. ;-)
Send me an IM I'll be your friend. :-)
If U want to burn yourself, remember that I love U. If U want to cut yourself, remember that I love U. If you want to kill yourself, remembr
I live in a cell of shuttered mini-blinds and constant connectivity via a computer and phone and it sucks. Blah.
I am trying to quell the rising jealous fury I'm feeling right now. Maybe I need a cupcake. :-)
You know what you look like to me, with your good bag and your cheap shoes? You look like a rube....
Had my X in my apartment for the 2nd time in two years. Still a little weird, but overall, just fine. Some semblance of a conversation, too.
My double standard: wearing underwear more than once is gross; wearing long underwear repeatedly is OK. Hmm. http://snipurl.com/8neso
Good thing I have The Current. And coffee. And this paddle game. And that's all I need.
169 looks like it's starting to become a parking lot. http://snipurl.com/8heau
Mmm. Happy Hour with Scott & Kat. http://snipurl.com/8bezg
Netflix on Mac = hours of 30 Rock. I love you, Liz Lemon! http://snipurl.com/84544
It's raining in 8 of the 13 cities I have listed in my weather app, including Hawaii. Rain rain go away...
Man... That girl is just smoking hot. ;-) http://snipurl.com/82lpd
You are truly the most beautiful girl here. Happy New Year.
I was thinking about a nap, but opted for coffee instead. And call your mother. She misses you. http://snipurl.com/9bfjb
Only 24 miles to go... At about 7MPH. Someone do the math for me. Boo. :(
I am in freeway HELL! http://snipurl.com/99toj
I have 35 days to find a new job. I'm excited, but a bit freaked out. What's gonna be next? Who's got a job opening or career advice?
My arm hurts from aggressive Wii play with my niece and nephew. Ouch.
I had no idea Photoshop costs so much. S'dale Apple Store=madhouse. But I did get my iMac back. Yay!
After family and friends, the next best thing about Xmas is $150 gift card at the Apple Store. Now, what to get...???
I'm wondering how many times, when I walk in, that someone stole my computer...? http://snipurl.com/91tgj
Good deed done. Penance (for one) complete.
Could be up to 4 days without my Mac. Looks like I picked the wrong day to quit sniffing glue.
Ooo. Genius Bar. My name's up on the screen and everything. I heart you, Apple. :)
Will be packing up my iMac for my date @ the Genius Bar. Please, be "geniuses" and fix my Mac! http://snipurl.com/91e8x
I think spending 1.5 hours trying to start a vehicle is reasonable before you walk away and get on with your unpaid day off.
My work vehicle is dead AGAIN. I feel like walking away and saying "fuck it". Damn this sense of responsibility!! http://snipurl.com/91917
Please tell me I'm not the only one concerned with baked on grease. Please? http://snipurl.com/90r32
Ex & recovering smokers: what was your secret to success? Please help...
